name: Rotten Lands
description:
This story based RPG-Maker game, is surely one of the most impressing games, you´ve ever seen.
Come over in the contaminated and from vitality robbed "Rotten Lands", and join the story - maybe you can help these lands to get healed?
Three plucky non-heroes would be thankful, if your brave heart would appear and find a way to escort them through their journey, to find the thruth about the dying earth!
What was that? You would give it a try?!
Thank you, Mario...or whatever your name is.

See the full background artwork (here)
